description.content: This endpoint allows you to register a user. Once registered, it will return an API key.

response.name: Successful response. Returns an object containing the API key.

description.content: This endpoint allows you to login to an account and retrieve an API key.

response.name: Successful response. Returns an object containing the API key and the information about the user.

description.content: This endpoint allows you to validate your API key.

response.name: Successful response. Returns an object containing information related to the user's access privilege.

description.content: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
This endpoint allows you to get the info about the users in the application.
(Required) The page number to retrieve (1-based index). Each page returns 20 users.

response.name: Successful response. Returns an object with users statistics in the application.

description.content: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
Added as a part of security scheme: apikey
This endpoint allows you to edit a user's details. This requires admin privileges.

response.name: Successful response. Returns an object containing user information.
